welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.content: Kids Money Manager allows you to manage your children's money in a convenient and secure way.

dashboard.title: Parent Dashboard
dashboard.content: In the dashboard you can see the total balance of all children, recent activity, and expenses chart by categories.

transactions.title: Adding Transactions
transactions.content: Use the bottom buttons to add money or record expenses. Select a child from the center button.

categories.title: Expense Categories
categories.content: You can create custom expense categories. Clicking on a category in the chart will show only its expenses.

children.title: Managing Children
children.content: Add new children, view their access codes, and update children's information.

allowances.title: Allowances
allowances.content: Set up automatic allowances that will be added to children's balance at the frequency you choose.

welcome.title: Hello!
welcome.content: Welcome to your money management app! Here you can see your balance and manage your money.

balance.title: Balance
balance.content: At the top you'll see your total balance, including money with parents and money in the physical cash box.

transactions.title: Adding Transactions
transactions.content: Use the bottom buttons to add income or record expenses. The center button is a calculator.

history.title: History
history.content: In the "My History" section you'll see all your transactions. You can filter by category or limit the number of displays.

goals.title: Savings Goals
goals.content: Set a savings goal to track your progress. You'll see how much is left to save to reach your target.

expenses.title: Expenses Chart
expenses.content: The chart shows your expenses by categories. Clicking on a category will show only its expenses in history.
